org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.restful.resources.cache

Class FifoResultsCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microtitan.diffusive.cache.FifoCache<java.lang.String,ResultCacheEntry<java.lang.Object>>
      • org.microtitan.diffusive.diffuser.restful.resources.cache.FifoResultsCache
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Cache entry object
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cache<java.lang.String,ResultCacheEntry<java.lang.Object>>, ResultsCache

    public class FifoResultsCache
extends FifoCache<java.lang.String,ResultCacheEntry<java.lang.Object>>
implements ResultsCache
    Basic cache for holding execution results. Manages the items cached, but doesn't know the details of the cache entries. Those details are left to the CacheEntry object.
    Author:
    Rob

        private static final int MAX_RESULTS
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • FifoResultsCache

        public FifoResultsCache(int maxResults)
        Constructs a basic cache that holds the specified number of entries. When an item is added, and that causes the number of items to exceed the maximum number of items, the oldest item is dropped.
        Parameters:
        maxResults - The maximum number of cache entries allowed.

      • FifoResultsCache

        public FifoResultsCache()
        Constructs a basic cache that holds the default number of entries. When an item is added, and that causes the number of items to exceed the maximum number of items, the oldest item is dropped. The maximum number of cached items (MAX_RESULTS) defaults to a value of 100.
